Title: Ajax Snippets
Description:
Ajax Snippets is a small framework built on Microsoft Ajax that simplifies serving up small forms and sending the values back using web services.

Ajax Snippets is a take on a technique Scott Gu demonstrated in his blog post - Cool UI Templating Technique to use with ASP.NET AJAX for non-UpdatePanel scenarios at the url: http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2006/10/22/Tip_2F00_Trick_3A00_-Cool-UI-Templating-Technique-to-use-with-ASP.NET-AJAX-for-non_2D00_UpdatePanel-scenarios.aspx.
HomeWiki:
Description

Ajax Snippets is a small framework built on Microsoft Ajax that simplifies serving up small forms and sending the values back using web services.

Ajax Snippets is a take on a technique Scott Gu demonstrated in his blog post - Cool UI Templating Technique to use with ASP.NET AJAX for non-UpdatePanel scenarios at the url: http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2006/10/22/Tip_2F00_Trick_3A00_-Cool-UI-Templating-Technique-to-use-with-ASP.NET-AJAX-for-non_2D00_UpdatePanel-scenarios.aspx.
